snippet: Josh Brent, a former Dallas Cowboys defensive tackle, was released from the Dallas County Jail following his conviction in a drunken car crash that killed his friend and teammate.
abstract: Former Dallas Cowboys defensive tackle Josh Brent is released from jail following his conviction in a drunken car crash in 2012 that killed his friend and teammate Jerry Brown; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Josh Brent, a former Dallas Cowboys defensive tackle, was released from the Dallas County Jail following his conviction in a drunken car crash that killed his friend and teammate.
